days.title: Rishikesh to Auli
days.description: Scenic drive through Panch Prayag. Visit Dhari Devi Temple. Arrive at Auli by evening.

days.title: Auli Exploration & Winter Acclimatisation
days.description: Hike to Gorson for panoramic views. Witness majestic Nanda Devi and peaks. Winter acclimatisation activities.

days.title: Auli to Niti Valley Exploration
days.description: Explore Malari, Sumna, and Tapovan. Spot Himalayan wildlife (Thar, Blue sheep, Snow leopard). Visit Sumna viewpoint and frozen landscapes.

days.title: Niti Village Exploration
days.description: Visit frozen Niti Mahadev temple. Hike to Payaar for valley views. Experience Bhotiya culture.

days.title: Niti to Rishikesh
days.description: Return drive through scenic routes. Memories of winter wonderland.

days.title: Arrival at Karchi
days.description: Travel to Karchi: Arrive by road. Accommodation: Local guesthouses or camps. Acclimatization: Explore the village.

days.title: Karchi to Kuaripass Base Camp
days.description: Distance: 8-10 km. Duration: 5-7 hours. Details: Ascend through forests and meadows. Lunch: Packed lunch on the trail. Camp: Set up near the Kuaripass base.

days.title: Kuaripass Summit and Return to Base Camp
days.description: Early Start: Pre-dawn ascent to summit. Summit Push: Reach Kuaripass (4,600 m), enjoy views. Descent: Return to base camp for lunch. Rest: Relax and enjoy the evening.

days.title: Base Camp to Karchi
days.description: Return Trek: Descend back to Karchi. Duration: 4-6 hours. Reflection: Take your time on the descent. Evening: Celebrate completion in Karchi.

days.title: Departure
days.description: Relaxation: Explore Karchi or engage with locals. Travel Home: Depart from Karchi.

days.title: Dehradun-Sankri [Base camp]
days.description: Altitude: 6400 FT. Drive: 190 km/8-9 hour. Route: Mussoorie, Purola, Mori, Netwar, Sankri.

days.title: Sankri → Juda Ka Talab (9,000 ft)
days.description: Trek through pine & oak forests (approx. 4 km). Reach beautiful frozen lake site. Stay: Campsite near Juda Ka Talab.

days.title: Juda Ka Talab → Kedarkantha Base Camp (11,200 ft)
days.description: Moderate trek with mountain views. Witness snow peaks like Swargarohini & Bandarpoonch. Stay: Base camp campsite.

days.title: Summit Day (12,500 ft) → Back to Sankri
days.description: Early morning summit push for sunrise views. Descend via Hargaon to Sankri. Stay: Guesthouse / Homestay.

days.title: Sankri → Dehradun
days.description: Drive back with unforgettable Himalayan memories. Trek ends.

days.title: Rishikesh to Lohajung
days.description: Beautiful drive via Devprayag, Karnaprayag. Stay in Lohajung homestay.

days.title: Lohajung to Didna
days.description: Moderate climb. Through dense forests and rivers.

days.title: Didna to Bedni Bugyal
days.description: Alpine meadows, views of Trishul. Camp overnight.

days.title: Bedni to Bhagwabasa
days.description: Cross Patar Nachauni & Kalu Vinayak. Camp at Bhagwabasa.

days.title: Bhagwabasa to Roopkund & Back
days.description: Reach Roopkund Lake. Return to Patar Nachauni.

days.title: Return to Lohajung
days.description: Same route descent. Stay in Lohajung.

days.title: Buffer Day
days.description: Used in case of delays. Otherwise explore Lohajung.

days.title: Lohajung to Rishikesh
days.description: Final drive back. Reach by evening.

days.title: Dehradun to Sankri
days.description: Scenic drive through Mussoorie and Yamuna Valley. Evening briefing and rest at Sankri (6,400 ft).

days.title: Sankri to Taluka (Drive), then trek to Seema
days.description: Drive to Taluka and start trek through dense forests. Cross streams and wooden bridges en route.

days.title: Seema to Har Ki Dun
days.description: Gradual climb with views of Swargarohini & Jaundhar glacier. Camp beside the river with a view of the valley.

days.title: Har Ki Dun Exploration Day
days.description: Optional hike to Maninda Tal or just enjoy meadow walks. Photography, story sharing around bonfire.

days.title: Har Ki Dun to Seema
days.description: Retrace steps along the valley. Spotting birds and wildlife.

days.title: Seema to Taluka (Trek) → Sankri (Drive)
days.description: Return trek to Taluka. Drive back to Sankri for overnight stay.

days.title: Sankri to Dehradun
days.description: Early morning drive back to Dehradun. End of a memorable Himalayan adventure.

days.title: Rishikesh to Joshimath
days.description: Will cover Panch Prayag and Dhari Devi Temple. It will be 7-8 Hr Drive.

days.title: Joshimath → Poolna → Ghangaria
days.description: Trek through forest & river paths. Reach basecamp at Ghangaria.

days.title: Valley of Flowers Exploration
days.description: Wildflower meadows in full bloom. Rare Himalayan flora and fauna. Breathtaking mountain views.

days.title: Ghangaria → Poolna → Joshimath
days.description: Return to base, overnight stay.

days.title: Joshimath to Rishikesh
days.description: Return drive to Rishikesh. Memories of an unforgettable Himalayan trek.
